Orphapacket.Label: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome due to AP3B1 deficiency

Synonyms.Synonym: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome due to adaptator related protein complex 3 subunit beta1 deficiency
Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome with neutropenia due to AP3B1 deficiency

TextSection.Contents: Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome type 2 (HPS-2) is a type of Hermansky-Pudlak syndrome (HPS) a multi-system disorder characterized by oculocutaneous albinism bleeding diathesis and neutropenia.

Gene.Name: adaptor related protein complex 3 subunit beta 1
Gene.DisorderGeneAssociationType: Disease-causing germline mutation(s) (loss of function) in
